summary:
Full-stack development on large-scale display management platform using Angular and TypeScript

- Maintained and extended shared core libraries in monorepo architecture
- Led dependency upgrades improving security, performance, and maintainability
- Designed and integrated authentication systems including two-factor authentication

Full-stack development on connected fitness platform using Vue.js and TypeScript

- Built streaming video delivery systems and IoT hardware integrations
- Designed metrics and analytics pipelines for engagement, research, and product planning

Led multidisciplinary teams delivering 20+ interactive STEM educational products

- Designed technical architecture and creative production pipelines
- Collaborated with researchers and educators on learning experience design

Converted Unity-based applications into web-based interactive experiences

- Built visual authoring tools for artists and content designers
- Led pipeline engineering for scalable interactive content production

Developed cross-platform STEM educational games using Unity (C#)

- Principal investigator and lead developer on NIH-funded educational games
- Collaborated with educators and researchers on curriculum-aligned systems
